titles.title: Congratulating Carlos Boozer, Corey Cogdell, and Matt Emmons for their outstanding achievements in the 2008 Beijing Summer Olympic Games.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 9/17/2008--Introduced. Honors the accomplishments and Olympic achievements of Carlos Boozer, Corey Cogdell, and Matt Emmons.
